title: PREVNAR® 13 Contraindications (pneumococcal 13-valent conjugate vaccine - diphtheria CRM197 protein)
description: 4 CONTRAINDICATIONS Severe allergic reaction (e.g., anaphylaxis) to any component of Prevnar 13 or any diphtheria toxoid-containing vaccine [see Description (11) ] .
cleaned_text: 4 CONTRAINDICATIONS Severe allergic reaction (e.g., anaphylaxis) to any component of Prevnar 13 or any diphtheria toxoid-containing vaccine [see [Description (11)](#S11)]. In order to provide you with relevant and meaningful content we need to know more about you. Please choose the category that best describes you.
